availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of David Unsell and Elizabeth Unsell. Married to Rebecca Ann Unsell. Stepfather of Rachael C. Stovall, Ruha A. Stovall, and Mary A. Stovall. Farmer in Ballard County in 1850. Farmer in Ballard County in 1860. Employed Greenberry Unsell and John Herindon as farm laborers in Ballard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, p. 295A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Tharps, p. 681.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Ballard County, KY, June and July 1863, p. 45.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Ballard County Wills, 1879-1924, p. 62-63.
